statements.statement: select * from TM_PHONGBAN order by PHONGBAN_ID

select A.* from TM_PHONGBAN A inner join LST_DICTIONARY B on A.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID = B.DICTIONARY_ID and B.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiPhongBan' and B.DICTIONARY_CODE = 'KhoaNoi' where A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
A.MAPHONGBAN != '$MAPHONGBAN$'
AND A.TAMNGUNG = '0'
select * from TM_PHONGBAN where TM_PHONGBAN.PHONGBAN_ID = '$value$' order by PHONGBAN_ID
select * from TM_PHONGBAN where TM_PHONGBAN.PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$' order by PHONGBAN_ID
statements.insert: insert into TM_PHONGBAN ( PHONGBAN_ID , MAPHONGBAN , TENPHONGBAN , TENPHONGBAN_EN , TENPHONGBAN_RU , LOAIPHONGBAN_ID , CAP , CAPTREN_ID , TRUONGPHONG , LOAIPHONGBENH_ID , TAMNGUNG , TENKHONGDAU , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , COTHUCHIENDICHVU , IDX , QUANLYNHANSU , ISKHOADIEUTRI , ISCHUYENKHOA , COSTCENTER_ID , CHUYENKHOA_ID , DIADIEMLAMVIEC_ID , ISKHOACAPCUU ) values ( #PHONGBAN_ID# , #MAPHONGBAN# , #TENPHONGBAN# , #TENPHONGBAN_EN# , #TENPHONGBAN_RU# , #LOAIPHONGBAN_ID# , #CAP# , #CAPTREN_ID# , #TRUONGPHONG# , #LOAIPHONGBENH_ID# , #TAMNGUNG# , #TENKHONGDAU# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #COTHUCHIENDICHVU# , #IDX# , #QUANLYNHANSU# , #ISKHOADIEUTRI# , #ISCHUYENKHOA# , #COSTCENTER_ID# , #CHUYENKHOA_ID# , #DIADIEMLAMVIEC_ID# , #ISKHOACAPCUU# )
statements.update: update TM_PHONGBAN set MAPHONGBAN = #MAPHONGBAN# , TENPHONGBAN = #TENPHONGBAN# , TENPHONGBAN_EN = #TENPHONGBAN_EN# , TENPHONGBAN_RU = #TENPHONGBAN_RU# , LOAIPHONGBAN_ID = #LOAIPHONGBAN_ID# , CAP = #CAP# , CAPTREN_ID = #CAPTREN_ID# , TRUONGPHONG = #TRUONGPHONG# , LOAIPHONGBENH_ID = #LOAIPHONGBENH_ID# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , TENKHONGDAU = #TENKHONGDAU# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , COTHUCHIENDICHVU = #COTHUCHIENDICHVU# , IDX = #IDX# , QUANLYNHANSU = #QUANLYNHANSU# , ISKHOADIEUTRI = #ISKHOADIEUTRI# , ISCHUYENKHOA = #ISCHUYENKHOA# , COSTCENTER_ID = #COSTCENTER_ID# , CHUYENKHOA_ID = #CHUYENKHOA_ID# , DIADIEMLAMVIEC_ID = #DIADIEMLAMVIEC_ID# , ISKHOACAPCUU = #ISKHOACAPCUU# where PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TM_PHONGBAN
TM_PHONGBAN.PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.MAPHONGBAN = '$MAPHONGBAN$'
TM_PHONGBAN.TENPHONGBAN = '$TENPHONGBAN$'
TM_PHONGBAN.TENPHONGBAN_EN = '$TENPHONGBAN_EN$'
TM_PHONGBAN.TENPHONGBAN_RU = '$TENPHONGBAN_RU$'
TM_PHONGBAN.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID = '$LOAIPHONGBAN_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.CAP = '$CAP$'
TM_PHONGBAN.CAPTREN_ID = '$CAPTREN_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.TRUONGPHONG = '$TRUONGPHONG$'
TM_PHONGBAN.LOAIPHONGBENH_ID = '$LOAIPHONGBENH_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.TAMNGUNG = '$TAMNGUNG$'
TM_PHONGBAN.TENKHONGDAU = '$TENKHONGDAU$'
TM_PHONGBAN.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TM_PHONGBAN.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TM_PHONGBAN.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.COTHUCHIENDICHVU = '$COTHUCHIENDICHVU$'
TM_PHONGBAN.IDX = '$IDX$'
TM_PHONGBAN.QUANLYNHANSU = '$QUANLYNHANSU$'
TM_PHONGBAN.ISKHOADIEUTRI = '$ISKHOADIEUTRI$'
TM_PHONGBAN.ISCHUYENKHOA = '$ISCHUYENKHOA$'
TM_PHONGBAN.COSTCENTER_ID = '$COSTCENTER_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.CHUYENKHOA_ID = '$CHUYENKHOA_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.DIADIEMLAMVIEC_ID = '$DIADIEMLAMVIEC_ID$'
TM_PHONGBAN.ISKHOACAPCUU = '$ISKHOACAPCUU$'
